# Welcome to the Markdown & Carousel Test!

This scenario demonstrates our new **markdown rendering** and **carousel functionality**.

## Features to Test:

1. **Rich Text Formatting** - *italics*, **bold**, and `code`
2. **Embedded Images** - ![Test Image](https://static.prod.ander.ai/files/5172e9d2-c0e8-4c14-9910-c1cb7b9b64ed)
3. **Lists and Links** - [Click here](https://example.com) to see a link
4. **Media Carousels** - Multiple images with navigation

> This is a blockquote to test formatting
